name: Tale of Ren: Searching for Heart Droplets
description: Me...Mizu Ren Nanami… As a REN people, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms. Then, the Rostania is the town where I was chosen to come here. to the pursuit of secrets that were never known before.

name: EV2: Earth Version 2
description: EV2 is a Open World, looter-shooter set in the frontier where cutting-edge technology meets the remnants of an ancient civilization. Defend humanity against a relentless global infestation of the Hive.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Mediterranean City-States
description: It is often remarked that the balmy lands around the Mediterranean are living through a second renaissance. The spirit of Galileo certainly seems to endure, in this new era of mechanical and architectural splendour.

name: Steel Aces
description: The upcoming historically accurate tank shooter with iconic vehicles from the inception of tanks to the modern era!

name: Steam Shot
description: Load, aim, and blast your friends and enemies away in this fun and fast paced VR steam punk WW1 era artillery shooter! Steam Shot offers a unique VR experience with physics-based controls, multiplayer, and huge cannons placed on top of controllable steam mechs!

name: Spank It
description: SPANK IT - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Stamped: An Anti-travel Game
description: Stamped follows the journeys of six young travelers whose paths intersect across Asian urban landscapes. Bound by pleasure-fueled self-destruction, the group flounders from city to city, confronting the grief and discrimination that caused them to travel in the first place.

name: Stardawn Heroes
description: Stardawn Heroes is a rogue-lite action adventure RPG set throughout the stars. Explore, battle, harvest, and craft your way through procedurally generated planets on your journey to the Gateway of the Ancients.

name: Starkheim Tournament
description: Starkheim Tournament is a simplified 2D fighting game set in fantasy universe with a pixel-art style. With only two primary attack buttons, and controls that do not require any complicated motions, Starkheim Tournament aims to be easy to pick up and only just moderate to master.

name: Sorrows End
description: A fantasy turn-based RPG, Made with RPG Maker MV. It utilizes a side view battle system, contains scenes that may be frightening and scenes of anguish. Sorrows End is a heart-wrenching tale of loss.

name: Slimewest
description: Face off against an invasion of slimes in this 2D roguelite with pixel art graphics. Play alone or with up to 4 friends and save the city from the devouring attack of these creatures. Get your weapon ready and embark on this bang bang western style adventure. Play now and prove your mettle!

name: Slav Junkie Simulator
description: You live in a small soviet slav eastern european cyberpunk city. You have severe heroin addiction that you need to sustain. Heroin is very expensive and earnings in a rural city are very small, barely enough for survival. Survive one week.

name: Six Sides Of Obscurity
description: Six sides of obscurity is a story-based RPG that you can play solo or with a team of up to 4 players. You will have endless build possibilities. Creating a character, increasing passive and active abilities according to class, producing equipment, adding tactical bonuses and runes, etc.

name: Soggy Beans
description: Fish will come, fish will go. Take photos, collect beans, decorate your seascape, then relax or do other things while your friends swim by in this calming side-idler.

name: Skibidi: Escape from Toilets
description: "Skibidi: Escape from Toilets" is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS - they want to kill you! Free content updates with new levels and game modes - YES YES YES!

name: SD Dungeons
description: Create your own character and go on a great adventure! Randomly generated dungeons at each level and gates that affect the difficulty of where you go await you! Can you get powerful weapons and gems and escape without running out of power?

name: Scrapbooking
description: Scrapbooking is relaxing game for all lovers of Scrapbooking and handicraft. Make your own scrapbooking masterpiece!

name: Scorching Desert
description: "Scorching Desert" is an open-world survival crafting game, where your main objective is to survive in a hot, unforgiving desert plagued by an ancient evil! You will need to gather resources, build a resillient shelter, stay hydrated & explore a massive 64km^2 Map!

name: Sex Lens: A Porn Story
description: Sex Lens: A Porn Story is a visual novel that places the keys to an intriguing cinematic world in your hands. You have the opportunity to participate in a luxurious and creative process, but be prepared for challenges that present you with difficult choices.

name: Shadows Of Deceit
description: Shadows of Deceit is a next-gen horror and psychological thriller game developed with Unreal Engine 5. While you are getting a chill down your spine with the impressive story and realistic locations, you will also witness the mystery behind Janet's story.

name: Sexual Sword Master
description: Engage in 2D action swordplay and deflect your opponent's attacks! Earn points in battles and level up! After the matches, go on dates with beautiful girls! And then... even more... ♡ High-quality H-animations with Live2D technology! Five charming girls are awaiting your challenge!

name: Sex Simulator: College Girls
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a university professor who gets busy with his female students.

name: Sex Apocalypse 2
description: Conquering the apocalypse has never been so vivid and emotionally charged! Welcome to the world of Sex Apocalypse 2 – the second installment of a unique third-person shooter.

name: Sex Play: College Girls
description: A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Enjoy the story of two female students getting naughty in their dorm room.

name: Shipwrecked
description: Explore, craft and fight your way on the uncharted islands! Shipwrecked is an Action-RPG where you will build your base, craft useful tools to survive and even use magic!

name: Sirius-4
description: "Sirius-4" is a plot-oriented space simulator that gives the player complete freedom of action as a hired pilot of the "Sirius" unit. The action takes place on the outskirts of human space during a turbulent time for the galaxy after a global war.

name: Simply Moose
description: Reflex-based puzzle game based on Boulder Dash principles, but with its own unique style.

name: Shlob
description: Sword Fight with your friends as goopy beans in Shlob. Use a unique and expansive locomotion system to get around the arenas! Skate, Jump & Boost yourself around as you learn about each arena's gimmick and fight to become the best Shloblet in Shlobtopia!

name: Runes
description: Runes is a single player fantasy open world rpg. You take on the roles of both Talesin, a flawed sorcerer, and Olwyna, a head-strong young thief, as they investigate the origins of a mysterious new potion in the town of Lewyst.

name: Rubicon: Cubindom
description: Rubicon is a turn-based puzzle game based on the principle of the Rubik's Cube. Use the game mechanics that the world has loved and our innovations to restore order to the inhabitants of Cubindom.

name: Road Rampage
description: Avoid all the cars and try not to crash in this fast paced endless highway game!

name: Robo Blaster
description: BLAST ROBOTS before ROBOTS BLAST you. Let's play a twin stick arcade shooter called ROBO BLASTER!

name: Rock A Bye
description: "Rock a Bye" is a cute 3D platformer where you play as a baby, bouncing, dashing, and collecting outfits in 5 dreamy worlds.

name: Rogue Nova
description: An intense, fast-paced real time strategy space opera, with a cast of colourful characters through a planet hopping adventure. Do you have what it takes to escape the relentless Baron protect of Princess Valeria?

name: Romance Club: Stories I Play
description: Immerse yourself in romantic visual stories where you control what happens!

name: Royale King
description: Win and be the royal king only you! Think right and jump at the right time.. Only one can win! Be it you!

name: Schrodinger's Cat Burglar
description: A puzzle heist adventure with a quantum flavour! The player controls Mittens the cat as she stumbles into a quantum experiment and gains incredible new powers - the ability to be in two places at once. Explore, solve logic puzzles and evade capture by pest control robots to ultimately save the day!

name: SandRipper
description: Tear across the desert, obliterating wave after wave with speed and precision. A punchy arcade shooter with unlimited weapon combinations!

name: Running Through The Beat
description: Synchronize yourself on the music and Run Through The Beat!

name: Run Gor
description: Dreams, synonymous with suffering and regrets. You are not sure what happened. Solve the mystery that surrounds you to get ahead, or not? Only you will know.

name: Saadex: Perpetual Storm
description: Saadex is a fast-paced sci-fi tower defense with RTS elements! Build, move and upgrade towers to fend off waves of relentless enemies. Utilize tactical skills to reshape the flow of battle in your favor. Challenge yourself to achieve ever higher scores and secure your place on the leaderboards.

name: GoGoGo
description: This is a fast paced casual game.

name: Regiments: Winds of Change
description: Soar on the winds of change. Navigate the unpredictable war paths of procedurally-generated Operations. Command one of the new French, Dutch, Canadian, or Czechoslovakian regiments as they enter the fray. Experiment with new tactics as heliborne infantry redefine the very shape of the battlefield!

name: Rift Wizard 2
description: Rift Wizard 2 is a tough as nails traditional roguelike wizard simulator. You play as an immortal amnesiac wizard who must journey through the cosmos to defeat his nemesis. Each run, you'll build a unique repertoire of spells, passive skills, and magical artifacts.

name: Re.wired
description: A story of loneliness in a connected world set in 90s Japan. Control high schooler Kazami through a psychological explorative visual novel horror to uncover the truth of garbled messages and student disappearances. Featuring 2D hand drawn anime sprites in an explorable 3D techno-horror world.

name: Repent
description: Robert Watford, a retierd cop with a troubled past, starts his first day as a night shift guard which unbeknown to him, would directly implicate him into a series of paranormal events revolving around a secretive cult with evil intentions.

name: Red Machina Teaser: ThoughtJudger
description: A narrative experience that tests the limits of your ethics and morals.

name: R:\Block
description: R:\Block is a puzzle game where you push and fuse blocks to solve increasingly difficult levels. It is also a puzzle platformer, that will force you to not only work your brain, but your jumping skills. Within the mysterious and atmospheric space a story unfolds.

name: Red Echo
description: In this Sci-Fi SinglePlayer RPG set on Mars in the near future workers aren’t born, they are made. Precious is the Perfect Worker. Hidden in her DNA is a secret the Corporations will not let go. Join Precious as the groundswell of rebels fight back against greedy corporations. Help set Mars' fate.

name: Railway Islands 2
description: Railway Islands 2 is a minimalist and relaxing puzzle game about designing a railway map for a large archipelago. Design a smooth journey for your trains as they transport people and vital resources between islands.

name: Rage Gang
description: RAGE GANG is an engaging multiplayer co-op PvP game about the hard life of the Robbers and Policemen. Choose your side, team up with friends, and steal something or fight the Gangs!

name: Quadruzzle
description: Quadruzzle is an exciting word puzzle game. Each day you will be tasked with solving a new puzzle by guessing four words with clues. To solve the puzzle, you will move 15 lettered tiles into their proper place on a 4 x 4 grid of 16 slots with only one open slot to move tiles into.

name: Puzzlerio
description: Puzzlerio is a puzzle game about creating a factory that takes ores from one point to another. Use transport belts, inserters, furnaces and tunnels to complete the factory.

name: Poly Survivor
description: Hordes of monsters are threatening the Poly Village! Raise your weapons, choose your equipments and enjoy the battles……But be aware of those powerful monsters! Make full use of the environment and collect items continuously. Keep getting stronger until finally you defeat your enemies.

name: Poly Kingdom: Siege
description: "Poly Kingdom: Siege" is a dynamic RTS taking you from a Native tribe to Roman Empire to Medieval kingdom! Engage in intense battles with siege weapons, traverse dangerous terrains, witness your empire evolve, and enjoy thrilling building destruction in this unique strategy game!

name: Polybius Invaders 2
description: Earth's fate hangs in the balance in this breathtaking retro inspired, Super Scaler Arcade Shoot-Em-Up.

name: Precision Point VR
description: Precision Point VR is a tactical VR shooter focused on close-quarters combat. Execute strategic breaches, rescue hostages, and engage in multiplayer shootouts. Whether you go solo or team up, each decision and bullet counts in this high-stakes SWAT-inspired experience."

name: Primit Shooter 2
description: Primit Shooter 2 is a roguelike shooter set in a universe where cute but dangerous aliens spawn from the Eye Tower. Players must develop their character, pick suitable weapons, and brave through consecutive waves of alien challenges, combining action and strategy for a thrilling experience.

name: Procrastinaut
description: Stranded for unknown reasons in the lower orbit of a purple gas giant, you are kind of just chilling out. You should probably get on with your mission. There's still plenty of time, though.

name: Project S.A.M
description: Evolve and build your own S.A.M to explore the underground and keep humans alive!

name: PSY in Apocalypse
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Nasu
description: Project Nasu is a 2D action and puzzle platformer where you play as a lab experiment trying to escape an evil scientist’s laboratory. Play as Nasu, using his snout to fire projectiles that propel you backward to evade, and fend off threats. Solve puzzles by activating platforms and deactivating lasers to ultimately escape the facility and save Nasu.

name: Nightmare Knight: Sacred Maiden & Fallen Magic
description: The young girl Rain, who became the sacred knight of the kingdom, was entrusted by Jas, the leader of the sacred knights and her lover, to investigate the disturbances occurring in a distant town named "Hakudeti".

name: Pellet Packer: Micro Munch
description: Chomp your way up the ranks in "Pellet Packer: Micro Munch"! A chaotic strategy survival game where everything- including your own control method- is your enemy.

name: Parkour Game 2
description: Parkour Game 2 is a 3D first person platform game where you have to jump your way to the finish line.

name: Paramedics!
description: Experience emergency medicine in Paramedics, an early-stage game. Play as an EMT, paramedic, or doctor, face realistic medical challenges, and team up in multiplayer mode. Perfect for medical enthusiasts and gamers alike. Join us in our evolving journey!

name: Panoptia
description: Panoptia is a narrative-driven atmospheric exploration game about a strange building called Panoptia that has mysteriously appeared in town. No one knows what secrets hides in its depths. Uncover these secrets if you hope to ever escape...

name: Paintball 3: Candy Match Factory
description: Join Boldy, the adorable green monster, on his sweetest and most thrilling adventure to fix the broken candy match factory: Paintball 3!

name: Order of the Elements
description: Order of the Elements is an oldschool, skilling-based, indie MMORPG powered by Unreal Engine. It is a passionate enthusiasts attempt to return to the basics of what makes a MMO fun; challenging gameplay and meaningful progression without loot boxes, micro transactions or pay 2 win.

name: Nude and Afraid: 11 Day Challenge
description: Take part in a 11 day dating survival challenge with four different partners in various biomes. You'll hunt, craft, forage, and defend your camp, as you romance your partner and build a relationship that goes beyond the challenge.

name: Office Fight
description: Laid off by Mega-corp, you're literally dead. As a ghost, possess office equipment, cause chaos, and ignite epic ragdoll brawls among coworkers for revenge. Office Fight: Work sucks, break stuff!

name: Over Many Waters
description: Over Many Waters is an exciting Mesoamerican adventure of seafaring and exploration. Play as young Leo, a lost-at-sea Spanish explorer of Spanish and Aztec descent. Adventure the isles of the Azurian Sea, a series of ancient islands and waterways under threat of curse, war, piracy, and invasion.

name: Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch
description: Crunch your way around fun, colourful worlds in "Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch"!

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 3
description: Do you hear that call? It's Cthulhu inviting you to play a new solitaire game!

name: Mystic Land: The search for Maphaldo
description: An old-school RPG game inspired by Wizardry 7, Might and Magic and Eye of the Beholder series. 2d grid-based movement, strategic turn-based combat and lots of places to visit and puzzles to solve.

name: New Roanoke
description: "New Roanoke" delivers an immersive narrative experience, blending elements of horror, suspense, and psychological thriller. Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted sci-fi world, brought to life by stunning visuals, atmospheric soundscapes, and chillingly realistic character performances.

name: Neo Testament
description: After our battle with AI, life as we knew it ended thousands of years ago. 5000 years have passed. I awoke from my sleep. My robotic body and "soul," I, "Marcus," set out to find the last organic matter for the future of humanity in a world controlled by AI. Follow my quest for salvation.

name: Neon Fantasy: Dogs
description: Neon Fantasy: Dogs is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Necro King
description: Necro King is a turn-based tactics roguelite in pixel art style. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life...

name: Nature's Element

name: Nephilim
description: "Nephilim" is a single-player social deduction game to reveal the heretics who have infiltrated the congregations. Throw down God's judgment on the fools who rebel against the omniscient machine god "La Place".

name: My Slow Life with the Princess Knight and Her Devoted Handmaiden
description: Garland used to be a formidable adventurer... But then he was betrayed and left for dead. Now he has a reputation as the Dragon Survivor and no one left in the world he can rely on. When he brings two beautiful servants into his life to tend his wounds, will he learn to open his heart again?

name: My Pleasure: Season 3
description: Welcome to the third and final season of My Pleasure, a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: My Daily Pets
description: "My Daily Pets" is a game where you care for alien pets and uncover their secrets. Feed them, play, train, and dance. Investigate their origins, document findings, and bond with these adorable extraterrestrial companions!

name: My Boss Leidi
description: A short 18+ kinetic novel about an exhausted college student and his boss.

name: Mercury

name: Maze Quest Master: Builder
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Builder.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: Maze Quest Master: Gunner

name: Maze Maverick
description: Dive into dynamic mazes, outsmart weird ghosts, and snatch coins in this thrilling arcade adventure. Are you maverick enough?

name: Math High Speed
description: Vamos apostar corrida!! Ótimo game para se tornar um super piloto no carro e nas 4 operações da matemática!!!

name: Magic Smasher
description: Use your magic skills to smash and dodge the magic orbs in this fast-paced arcade game.

name: Design & Conjure
description: Join Dalia, a young witch, in her cozy adventure to fix her hometown. Reconnect with nature and bring beauty back as you clean, decorate, solve light puzzles, and help magical creatures affected by the mysterious corruption.

name: Monster Racing League: Phoenix Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack in association with Steve Spohn. Half of the proceeds of this pack go to The Able Gamers Charity.

name: Murayaki Villain
description: The very domination! Be the demon king who conquers the world! "Murayaki Villain"a village-burning, female-oriented, ♀ > ♂ Demon King Army training SLG

name: Mountain Driving
description: Mountain Driving is an open world mountain driving game, but the map in the game is not very large. Because this game was developed by one person.

description: A 10-15 hour singleplayer/co-operative campaign playable with 1-4 players.

name: Let's go
description: This is a casual game with a very simple gameplay mode

name: Magic Bean
description: This is the ultimate test of skill and determination: Magic Bean , an intense platformer. So, are you up for the challenge ?

name: Macabre Stage Vol. 1: Cursed Cartridge
description: This puzzle game looks normal, but it has something disturbing, a macabre mystery awaits you in this cartridge.

description: Enter the mafia underworld of 2D Chess, where animals take on the roles of mob bosses. Play 10+0 minute games online on the Lichess server. Analyze your moves with Stockfish. Checkmate with style in this captivating cartel-themed chess adventure!

description: Leap, slash, dash, and ricochet your way through a ruined land in this hand-drawn 2D action-exploration game. Wield your light arrow against vicious foes and unlock new abilities to further explore the mountain of Essa. Along the way, you'll uncover the truth and choose the destiny of Lighthoof Noa.

name: Little Dasher!
description: Little Dasher! is a mini-game that offers an average of 30-45 minutes of enjoyable and challenging platform game experience with fantastic music. Please note that the time depends on your reflexes and abilities.

description: Set off on an enchanting Match-3 journey into an underwater realm where the everyday fades away! Explore a mesmerizing aquatic world filled with intricate Match-3 challenges that will lead you through vibrant coral gardens and beautiful submerged landscapes.

name: Jery Mice vs Cats: Home Invasion
description: The eternal battle between Mice and Cats. You're a cute Mouse, so try to survive and avoid getting caught in a house full of Cats. Enjoy funny gameplay with numerous tricky situations. Clean the house of all these annoying animals!

name: Iron & Lead
description: Hop in the gunner's seat of the Abner Jack in this first-person, arcade alley shooter set in a dieselpunk world. Fight through five chapters of relentless foes to defeat the invaders, and defend your planet. Swap between different guns, and use deployables as you battle against both ground and air.

name: I Pick Skills
description: 200+ skills, 9 heroes with different styles, dozens of world effects, and many unique equipment with random skills!

name: Invaders 360
description: A modern tribute to arcade legends! This shoot'em up arcade game revives the classics after 45 years with fresh graphics and innovative gameplay. Become a part of Space Ranges Inc. Join now! Get the high score!

name: In Fair Spirits
description: A sweet slice of life boys love / yaoi visual novel set in the English countryside about a couple of young men who bond over mutual bereavement. Also, one of the main characters is over 1000 years old.

name: Kitchinko
description: Join the Kitchen Crew as they make different meals from around the world! Fire away at the pegs on screen to be able to clear out the red plus pegs, and advance to different levels! Race to get the fastest time and brag to your friends!

description: Prepare for unforgettable moments filled with flirtation, romance, sex, and conversations that could change the course of events during this unique team-building trip. Will love ignite in the hearts? Will relationships grow stronger? It all depends on you and your virtual reality seducer persona

name: House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature
description: Escape into the serene world of natural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature DLC. This expansion redefines the boundaries of puzzle-solving.

name: House of Jigsaw: Happy puzzling, Happy home
description: Welcome to the House of Jigsaw: Happy puzzling, Happy Home an immersive world of puzzling delights that will leave you captivated and craving for more. This free-to-play game offers a treasure trove of Jigsaws, with the option to enhance your experience through exciting DLC packs.

name: House of Jigsaw: Impressive Animals
description: This expansion introduces a new dimension to the House of Jigsaw series, combining the enigmatic challenges of Jigsaw puzzles with the awe-inspiring power of the animal kingdom.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Greatest Architecture
description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through architectural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: The Greatest Architecture DLC. This expansion pushes the boundaries of puzzle-solving as you navigate intricate environments inspired by some of the world's most iconic buildings.

name: Hunter Nightmare
description: HunterNightmare "is a horror survival game suitable for 1-2 players. You have been entrusted to come to this village and need to search for items scattered in the area. Burning three cursed items among numerous items will result in the death of monsters in this area and victory.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Souls of a Feather
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Scourge: Morrigan (Hunter), Scourge: Midian (Hunter), Wing's Wake (Winfield 1893 Slate Riposte), Heart's Dowry (LeMat Mark II UpperMat), Cagebreaker (Sticky Bomb).

name: I Commissioned Some Letters
description: I paid more artists to hide letters and stamps in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Honked: A Clown Noir
description: Honked! is a narrative-adventure game about a mysterious world of Clowns where not all is as it seems.

name: Hexillume
description: Connect the hexagons to light them up. Experience beautiful colour themes in every level. Discover new hexagon types as you progress.

name: Hexrite
description: You are a sorcerer part of a group of mysterious characters embarking on an adventure to fulfil an ancient magical ritual. Fight, quest and explore in this stylized action-adventure indie title!

name: Hentai HotLady
description: This is another story of Kozue Nada, a popular character in 'Hot Fit!' It contains many intense, sexy, and abnormal scenes with the main character of the original story.

name: Hentai Swapy Puzzle
description: Hentai Swapy Puzzle is a puzzle game. It is relaxing, fun and not hard. Game has soft musics on background to enhance the relaxation.

name: Grønland
description: Explore the frozen North, investigate your past, and try to remember... or forget. Grønland is a mysterious adventure game set in the lower Arctic of the late 19th century.

name: Goblin Siege: Protect the Castle!
description: Goblin Siege: Protect the Castle! is a tower-defense game where you will have to defend your castle from a siege of goblins. Recruit soldiers, plan your strategy, and have fun!

name: Greg's Deadly Draft
description: You have been kidnapped by an evil mascot named Greg White Shark. Traverse through the stadium and battle for your life as he tries to recruit you for his failing football team.

name: Hashrine
description: Alphabet, Numbers and Symbols.

name: Hank
description: When an evil teddy bear wields dark magic to corrupt all the other toys in the house, it's up to Hank to defend his home before his family returns.

name: Halloween Stories: Black Book Collector's Edition
description: Your plans to have a fun Halloween night in with your little sister quickly turn dark when she's kidnapped by a nightmarish specter! With the line between your home and the supernatural world blurred, can you save her in time?

name: Hakuba School! Hunting Prey
description: Welcome to Hakuba school! Live a student life in Hakuba and solve the mysteries surrounding the school and your past...

description: Hacker's Life is a game where you take the seat of a hacker, infect devices all over the world with malware, and join a hacker group to pull off bigger attacks. See your malware take control of the world and become famous for your hacking skills, but be careful not to get busted.

name: Hentai Ancient Secret
description: Relaxing puzzle game for a good mood

name: Hell Well
description: Survive as a dark sorcerer and collect fallen spirits to turn them into your own unholy defense against corrupt angels!

Play as Guna, looking for his brother who mysteriously disappeared. On his journey, he is haunted by bad things from other worlds and even from his own world.
