name: Flyout
description: Build and fly realistic aircraft. Use free-form fuselage and wing editor tools and tune your engines to recreate aircraft from any era or design your own.

name: Front Office Football Nine
description: Put yourself in the Front Office with Front Office Football, the professional football simulation from Solecismic Software. Manage your roster through trading, free agency and the amateur draft. Create game plans, organize depth charts and watch your franchise thrive for decades.

name: FutaMarket
description: The FutaGang have taken the control of the Underground and it's Black Market. They gave you a store and you need to work for them now. What happened? Collect datas, pictures, videos and discover the truth using your hacking skills & sex appeal.

name: Gate of Torment
description: Gate of Torment is a top-down 2D hardcore dungeon crawler extraction shooter, where you are seeking a way to escape Hell. Armed with guns and black magic, you raid dark and dangerous dungeons by using a mysterious portal device.

name: Gem Defender: Soyjak Survivors
description: Follow Chud on his fight against Dr Soystein's 'jak army in this spine-tingling survival shooter.

name: Geneforge 2: Infestation
description: Wildly open-ended fantasy adventure in a unique fantasy world. Use battle or diplomacy and trickery to change the world, served by an army of custom-made mutant monsters. Almost 90 zones to explore and 50+ hours of gameplay. Enormous range of abilities, factions, quests, and paths to victory.

name: Ghost Girl Ghussy: XXXL Edition
description: Reaching unheard of levels of horniness our protagonist will settle for anything; if it has a hole, that's the goal! So of course, after hearing the urban legend of a giant ghost girl in his neighborhood our would-be ghost hunter hits the streets searching for this sexy specter!

name: Goblin Quest
description: Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline. From playing the hero who saves the lands to the villain who destroys it, the world will adapt and respond to your actions. You decide your fate.

name: G-Mode Archives 50: Midnight Horror School
description:
Can you save the school from a crisis with your mysterious powers? Mystery-solving adventure set in a school at midnight.

"Midnight Horror School" is an adventure game that was once produced and distributed for feature phones based on 3DCG anime works broadcasted in CS, etc.

"Midnight Horror School" where ghosts born from forgotten tools can take classes to create "wonders" that prove their existence.

The player operates the ghost boy "Hickey" of the red and blue pencil, chooses two people from his friends according to the situation, organizes a party, and solves the mystery that happens at school.

Let's find a way to find and revive friends who have become "entity" (tools and things) and save the school.

name: G-Mode Archives 49: Gregory Horror Show
description:
Use the abilities of the terrifyingly cute guests, Escape from the mysterious "Gregory House" hotel...

"Gregory Horror Show" is based on the popular 3DCG horror comedy broadcasted by CS Broadcasting (Kids Station), etc.
It is a horror adventure game that was once produced and distributed for feature phones.

Players aim to escape from the hotel "Gregory House" while solving the mystery by borrowing the ability of the guests by making full use of the special ability "Soul Exchange" to transfer to the character.
There are also many mini-games with unique characters in the game.

The ending changes depending on the player's choice and behavior. In addition, the stage of the bonus game after clearing will increase, so you can enjoy it again and again.
Please enjoy the hotel life that unfolds with a little scary but cute characters ...

name: Freak Hunter A Retro Type: Bonus Level Pack
description: Dozens of fun levels await you in this dlc package. It promises you pleasant hours with its interesting section designs.

name: FPVSIM Drone Simulator
description: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that combines great graphics with great stick feel, featuring high consistency with its machine learning powered quadrotor dynamics engine that's also also hand tuned by top drone racers around the world.

name: From Glory To Goo
description: A sci-fi survival RTS set on an alien world. Establish a colony, explore for resources and customize your spacecraft. But beware, The Goo is ever present and it's coming from every direction, even above and below.

name: Twisted Christmas Jam 2022
description: 13 varied (some rather large) maps + custom start map. This year, there was no 1024^3 space constraint, and jammers used a mix of Halloween and Christmas themes since there was no Halloween jam.

name: Empire of Disorder
description: An episode of 9 small maps with various classic themes (base, medieval, wizard, runic, brick, etc.) for vanilla Quake, but also works well in Copper / with co-op support.

name: The Spiritworld
description: Large episode with 7 main levels + 3 secret levels + custom start map + new end boss, all inspired by Quake 1 episode 4 (Elder World) in a classic-ish id1 style. Supports co-op.

name: Triune Discovery
description: Map pack centered around a Jump Boots item that adds a double jump ability. There are five levels set in Mayan ruins in canyons and caves, a miliary bases, and a crumbling castle. It also features a few custom monsters from Rubicon 2, new skyboxes and music tracks.

name: Deathmatch Dimension
description: A single player episode containing 10 maps inspired by the official Quake deathmatch maps. Features four previously released and now updated maps, as well as five completely new maps and a start map. Most levels are medium-sized and take 10-20 minutes to complete. All maps can be played in sp, coop or dm and support all skill levels.

name: Fazbear Fright Attraction
description: Fazbear's Fright Attraction, otherwise known as FNaF 3: PLUS by fans is an indie point-and-click fangame developed by LostPawPlay, taking inspiration from Phisnom's cancelled project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus to create a sequel based around his original recreation of Phisom's works, FNaF Plus Restored. Like his initial release, Fazbear's Fright Attraction is an alternative take on Scott Cawthon's Five Nights at Freddy's 3.

name: And All That Could Have Been
description: Large, professionally built industrial map using Speedbase textures.

name: Day of the Lords
description: Large ancient castle with custom textures, great details and atmosphere.

name: Penguin World
description: Penguin World is a delisted Facebook game released in 2010 based around penguins. The gameplay has been described as a combination of Treasure Isle and Club Penguin, where you play minigames, gain coins and buy items to decorate your world with.

name: Menkalinan
description: Very huge beautifully crafted egyptian temple, diverse and challenging gameplay.

name: Penile Devastation
description: Medium-sized detailed Metal map.

name: Temple of Azathoth
description: Medium-sized red runic style temple.

name: The Final Threat
description: Medium to large, interconnected, professionally built IKBase map. Features the Mega Enforcer from Zerstörer.

name: The Castle of Koohoo
description: Small mappack in a swamp/tribal setting. Features a start, main level and boss map.

name: Colony
description: Huge and very detailed space colony level with custom textures, new monsters such as Shock Troopers and Battle Mechs, as well as some other additional progs.

name: Dawn of Eternity
description: Large Metal/gothic lava fortress with a bunch of modified and new monsters, as well as a medium sized, hard secret map. Very high monster count in both maps, compensated by slight changes to some weapons and ammo system.

name: The Masque of Red Death
description: Large Medieval mountain fortress with extreme scale and horde combat.

name: Sonic Dimensional Funkin'
description: Sonic Dimensional Funkin' is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series, featuring six weeks and 17 main songs, with a few extras.

name: Luobu
description: Luobu was a Chinese localized edition of Roblox made for mainland China by Tencent Interactive Entertainment Group and Roblox Corporation.

name: The Lorax: Truffula Shuffula
description: The Lorax: Truffula Shuffula is a mobile game based on the 2012 movie adaptation of The Lorax.

name: Clear Plan
description: During the Warring States period, you got lost and broke into the forest.

name: Baff Halloween
description: Minimalist, hardcore, and challenging game in the avoid-em-up genre with a creepy style that will test your reflexes, timing, and planning! This game is as hard as hell!

name: Bloody Moon
description: This is a single-player third-person shooter about the zombie virus outbreak in the future world, as the last survivor and the last resistance of the zombies!

name: Deer Hunt
description: Set out on a hunt to capture the best deer! Strategically move your units while being careful not to spook it. Play hundreds of hand crafted levels designed to challenge and engage you intellectually set in a beautiful relaxing medieval world.

name: Dream Cafe
description: Step into a dreamy world of macarons and cafe management! Craft colorful delights, satisfy whimsical customers, and become the Macaron Maestro in Dream Cafe. Ready to run your dream factory?

name: Catch Them Sweetie
description: Welcome to the card fishing simulator! Time to clear the pond of monsters. Pick a target, build the Deck, and try your Luck! Oh, and don't touch the duck, okay?

name: Doctor Arcana and The Secret of Shadowspire
description: Doctor Arcana's second adventure takes you to a legendary castle on a mysterious island where new puzzling challenges await and dark secrets are guarded by deadly traps. Can you complete the Trials of the Elders?

name: CatExpress
description: Cat Express is a relaxing and healing game that combines running, fishing, and collection gameplay. In the game, you can play as a cat to complete express delivery tasks and earn coins to buy various furniture to decorate your cat house. In your free time, you can also go fishing to relax.

name: Defenders Guild
description: A thrilling fantasy tower defense game! Instead of towers, you'll recruit and lead brave adventurers in the fight against hordes of evil enemies. Do you have what it takes to lead the best guild of defenders and safeguard the land from the growing darkness?

name: Capybarista
description: Build and manage your own cozy coffee shop in this relaxing, customizable, multiplayer game. Serve unique drinks, complete daily tasks, and collaborate with friends to make your shop thrive. Get ready to sip, socialize, and unwind!

name: Bane Murrain
description: Dayne Muren, a nervous wreck of an engineer working on the K.R.E.V research station, is thrown into the midst of a biohazard bloodbath when a meteorite collision turns his crewmembers into mutated creatures.

name: Daisy's Diary
description: Daisy's Diary is an adorable post-apocalyptic survival game that utilizes farming and community management as well as engaging real-time combat and strategy. Create and grow your own safe haven, battle hordes of zombies, and discover that the undead might NOT be the biggest threat after all!

name: Enmazened
description: Enmazened is a navigational exploration adventure through a minotaur filled, trap ridden maze ripe with treasure and adventure around every corner... and there are lots of corners! Will you be the first to reach the center and have your deepest wish granted?

name: Fairyland Solitaire
description: Embark on an enchanting solitaire adventure in Fairyland, where the mischievous goblins have kidnapped the fairies, and it's up to you to rescue them while unlocking hidden treasures in a whimsical world.

name: Arcane Survival
description: Craft, build, survive, and defend against menacing monsters in this 2D survival sandbox game, Arcane Survival. Research, fortify and expand your base/combat capabilities using resources found in the world! Protect this flame that keeps you alive, feed the essence of your enemies and grow stronger!

name: Expiri: Tenebris
description: A ship, an archeget. And the darkness!

name: Copper Corrosion
description: Copper Corrosion is a turn-based strategic RPG game inspired by Cthulhu mythology and set in a Victorian-era steampunk world infused with H.P. Lovecraft-inspired stories and a unique combat system.

name: Elodya
description: Explore, craft, fight! Uncover the mysteries of the continent of Elodya by meeting interesting characters, completing quests, upgrading your gear and defeating tough bosses!

name: Breaking Box: Rush!
description: A physics puzzle game that can only rush.

name: Breakthrough: Kemet X
description: Young warrior prince Jaraqo embarks on a warpath to become the pharaoh of a newly discovered galaxy the Kemetians have colonised and named Kemet X. However, he encounters formidable opposition from galactic overlords who resist his rule over the galaxy.

name: Ashes of the Past
description: In the devastated ocean city you find yourself as Werner, searching for his wife, resisting looters, hunger and thirst... Explore, solve and survive in this city...

name: ATV Offroad Simulator 24
description: Are you ready for the real offroad experience with ATV Offroad Simulator 24? Discover the excitement of ATV riding in an adventure-filled, open world.

name: Dungeon: Cradle of Hell
description: Hell does exist after all! And if you want to return home, you will have to pass this test and clear your way with weapons!

name: Fallen Down
description: Fallen Down is a strategy tactics card game and visual novel. Save all of reality. Face the gods and their creations. There will be lots of heroism, laughter, and tears along the way.

name: Doc Ati
description: Arcade game taking a stand against the use of childlike features in sexual imagery in video games.

name: Doors24
description: Protect your computer from an incoming swarm of viruses. Build and upgrade towers made from everyday life objects. Develop your own powerups to strengthen yourself!

name: Chin Chinny Chin Mouse Cheese Chin Toes
description: Embark on a toe-tally awesome adventure as a relentless little mouse with a big appetite for nibbling toes. Explore a world spiraling into absurdity as you nibble your way through various states of societal collapse. Toe the line of hilarity and insanity!

name: Crime: 1997
description: Newport, 1997: Waterside gang member, Henry Gallagher, is thrust into danger following a failed deal, tangling with the police and the Sorvino Mafia. A riveting drug sweeps the city, igniting hidden conflicts.

name: DisOrder in the Court
description: DisOrder in the Court is a 3-8 player party game where players must talk themselves out of comically embarrassing or ridiculous scenarios. Play as convicts competing for a presidential pardon as your questionable past is brought to light.

name: Bean Beasts
description: Defeat monster hordes alongside your Bean Beasts in this cute, challenging Tower Defense Game! Evolve your companions, explore upgrade paths for traps and take on epic boss battles!

name: Ezerath Plus
description: Expansion of Ezerath's Last Hope adding new regions, dungeons, monsters, and access to new items.

name: Avoid
description: Experience the fast-paced thrill of Avoid, a first-person endless runner with a head turning twist–you rotate the world around you to avoid obstacles.

name: Enter The Night
description: Enter The Night is a rogue-lite hybrid of two addictive genres: survival and survivors. Collect, harvest & craft during the day. Defeat hordes of enemies at night. Equip yourself with the right gear and absurd weapons. Cook and eat delicious food to get stronger. How many days can you survive?

name: Explaining Every String
description: No online, no services, no DLCs, no open-world, no rogulike, no roguelite, no metroidvania, no backtracking. Can't say "no god" cause god participate in one of boss fights. Not on your side. It's just straight line from start to finish. And skill required to get through it. Party like 1989.

name: Avaris3
description: More than 12,000 units battle on the battlefield!

name: Dos-Plan
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a a professional agent whose goal is to sneak into the most protected corners of the map and go unnoticed. The zone is very well guarded and in order to reach the desired target, you will have to be very careful.

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges
description: In this game, we will play with the simplest automaton model, Finite State Automaton, and use it to cope with 30 challenges.

name: Do Not Smile
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Each game level is filled with various traps and quest items. You need to move around the level, bypassing the traps and completing the task. Carefully think over each of your actions, because the charges to change gravity are not infinite.

name: Extreme Riding
description: Extreme Riding is an racing game where your task is to test your skills in driving different cars on exciting tracks. Choose your car and go to the track! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line in a certain time.

name: Dust Front RTS
description: Dust Front is a classic RTS with grand strategy elements and a non-linear campaign. Lead strategic maneuvers, overwhelm your enemies with cannon fodder, or stomp them into the stone age with carpet bombing on the lifeless fields of Dust Front.

name: Dawn of Insolence
description: A top-down roguelike with a deck-building system. Create your own unique deck of weapons, passive items and other upgrades. Each time you level up, you will be given random upgrades from your deck. Unlock new upgrade options to personalize your deck and survive the hordes of enemies.

name: CryptaSync Cyber: Urban Depths
description: Embark on a cyberpunk odyssey in ever-shifting catacombs, where shadows conceal dreadful adversaries. Arm yourself with cutting-edge cyberpunk guns, facing array of stalkers. No run is alike; adapt or face consequences. Immerse in a world of shadows and neon - you're Cyberpunk, but your world isn't!

name: Escape the Glubinka
description: December 6, 1994. the village of Glubnkovo. You were driving home after a very difficult day along an abandoned village and did not notice a tree peeking out ahead. In an instant, complete darkness overtook you and you passed out...

name: Ball Breaker
description: Crie combinações malucas e esmague todos os insetos atirando bolas com vários efeitos e aprimorando seus poderes. Sobreviva o máximo que puder e faça as combinações mais selvagens que puder. A cada rodada, você fica mais forte, mas os inimigos também...

name: Fallen
description: A minigame collection game where you help people in the town of Havoton to regain your angelic status!

name: Dungeon Girl
description: A challenging 2D side-scroller RPG game where you have only one life and death is permanent. Survive 40 interchangeable levels with your wits and consumables to get the Amulet of Yendor and escape the Dungeon with it.

name: A Tale of Two Lovers
description: A Tale of Two Lovers store is a visual novel game for adults only. This game is about two young lovers who like to love each other after the day's rush.

name: Eros Lights: Strip-Club
description: Welcome to the world of intrigue and incredible adventures in Eros Lights: Strip-Club, a visual novel for adults that takes you to a mysterious and magical club where the true faces of mystery are revealed.

name: Tower of Boin
description: Sin descripción

name: The King of Fighters Bundle
description: The King of Fighters Bundle comes with 6 games plus Upgrade pack 1 and 2 for The King of Fighters XIV: Galaxy Edition!

name: Metal Slug Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: R-Type Final 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Soar to new heights and save big with the R-Type Final 2 Ultimate Edition which includes the base game, all DLC sets, Soundtrack, Art Book, and more.

name: Afterdream & Distraint Series Bundle
description: This bundle comes with 3 games and the soundtrack for Distraint 2!

name: Persona Collection
description: Experience the power of Persona today!

name: Terraformers + Tin Can: To Infinity, and Beyond Bundle!
description: Get two space games in one pack! Terraformers and Tin Can!

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Deluxe Edition
description: The culmination of the Sword Art Online game series, Last Recollection features the largest roster of SAO playable characters and sub scenarios!

name: Sporestory
description: Help reunite a town of lost spores.

name: Loona Landa
description: Gotta save all them cute little bunnies!

name: Super High School Danger Course
description: Survive through 85 courses of fire, mines and other things that could only reasonably be described as "gameplay complications" in this game only for the Playdate.

name: Goodnight Universe
description: A micro audio game to fall asleep with about the heat death of the universe.

name: Godspeed
description: One schoolbus, one ticking bomb, only one way to- forward. Godspeed, a new game for Playdate.

name: Coloring Pixels: Halloween 5 Pack
description: This Halloween-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Halloween is back for round 5 and it's just as spooktacular!

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Parque Fernando Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Parque Fernando.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Medved-Taiga Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Vurhonga Savanna Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: Birch Simulator
description: The main characters of modern games can be very different. Brave knights, brilliant scientists or superheroes saving entire worlds. This game offers you a more unusual experience. Here you can become a Birch.

name: Sonata
description:
Role-playing game for PlayStation.
As a "romantic parallel RPG," players form a party from among eight women and ultimately choose one woman as their partner.

name: Oriental Blue
description: Oriental Blue is a cancelled RPG in the Far East of Eden (Tengai Makyō) series that was in development by Hudson and Red Entertainment for Nintendo 64DD in late ‘90. A few years later, in an interview published on the japanese Nintendo website, Kaori Shirozu (director and designer at Hudson at the time) explained that the project was resurrected and re-developed as a GBA game and finally released in 2003 as Oriental Blue: Ao no Tengai.

name: QuantAttack
description:
QuantAttack is an action puzzle game.
The rules are based on the theory of quantum computers, and you can learn how they work as you play.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 46 - Justice League Dark
description: A powerful curse is burning through the world's most powerful magic users, escalating their powers to dangerously violent extremes! Hoping Batman can take on the hard work, John Constantine's transported his House of Mystery to overlook Gotham Cemetery, where he and it are now under attack. In Justice League Dark Cursed, players will join forces with Batman and members of the Justice League Dark to put an end to this threat to all magic.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 1 - Fight for the light
description: The first DC Universe Online episode, Fight For The Light. This episode allowed players to embark on a new adventure with Green Lantern and Sinestro Corps as their battle becomes the forefront of the episode. Some of the key features of this episode include a new Tier 3 Duo in Ferris Aircraft, two Tier 2 Alerts with Oan Sciencells and S.T.A.R. Labs Research Facility, and a Tier 3 alert in Coast City. This episode also brought the new Controller powerset "Light", based on Green and Yellow lanterns for heroes and villains respectively

name: Jected: Rivals - Expansion Pack
description: Boost your roster with the Jected Expansion Pack!

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 2 - Lightning Strikes
description: The second episode, Lightning Strikes, was released on December 6, 2011. This episode allowed players to battle through new open-world solo and group activities in a new high-level open-world map of Central City. Players can explore the origin of The Flash and take on some of his opponents in the villainous Rogues. Some of the key features of this episode include the open-world Central City map with daily Tier 3 missions, nine daily Tier 3 Bounties, and a Flashback Tier 2 Duo. Alongside this content came the new Healer power "Electricity"

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 3 - The Battle for Earth
description: On March 13, 2012, the third episode, The Battle for Earth, was released. This episode largely continued the story in the fight against Brainiac which was one of the main storylines in the DC Universe Online base game. Players would fight for the fate of the universe with cooperative gameplay against Braniac. Some of the key features of this episode include three Tier 2 Duos in Riverfront Center, Gotham Hospital, and Riverside Hotel, one Tier 3 Alert in South Gotham Courthouse, and two Tier 4 Raids in the Gates of Tartarus and The Prime Battleground. In addition, the new Tank power, "Earth" was added in and the Battle For South Gotham featured daily Tier 2 missions

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 4 - The Last Laugh
description: The fourth episode, The Last Laugh, was released on June 19, 2012. This episode focused on the Joker as he gained access to hero and villain safe houses to stir up additional controversy between the player factions. Some of the key features of this episode include one Tier 3 hero Duo in Shady Nightclub, and one Tier 3 villain Duo in Police Station. This marked the final performance of Arleen Sorkin before her retirement. This was also her final time voicing her iconic character Harley Quinn.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 5 - Hand of Fate
description: On August 14, 2012, the fifth episode, Hand of Fate, was released. The episode revolved around DC hero Doctor Fate and would give players a chance to fight through new mystical story content. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 4 4-player Operations in Wayward Souls, and Soul Alchemy. In addition, this episode released four Tier 4 8-player Operations in With a Vengeance, A Black Dawn, Unpaid Dues, and Seeds of Rot.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 6 - Home Turf
description: The sixth episode, Home Turf, was released on January 29, 2013. The episode focused on both new and iconic locations that DC fans would be familiar with as they battle through new objectives and missions. Some of the key features of this episode include two daily Tier 4 hero missions located at Ace Chemicals and Stryker's Island, two daily Tier 4 villain missions located at Steelworks and Arkham Island, and daily Tier 4 Bounties.

name: Dreamwalker
description:
This game was made as a part of the Tirana Game Jam Edition 1.0, where the theme was "Dreams".

This game is a blend of "The Lemmings" and "Monument Valley". You are in control of the sleepwalkers and you must get them to bed safely and securely. You do so by giving them traits with which they can traverse the environment.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 7 - Origin Crisis
description: On May 8, 2013, the seventh episode, Origin Crisis, was released. The episode continued the story from The Battle for Earth episode, as players travel through time to fight for control of space, time, and the universe itself. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 5 Challenges in Iconic Anomaly: The Hunt and Iconic Anomaly: Test Subject #1, two Tier 5 4-Player Operations in Brothers in Arms and Family Reunion, and two Tier 5 Raids in Nexus of Reality and Paradox Wave while introducing the new Controller power, Quantum, where players control time and space.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 8 - Sons of Trigon
description: The eighth episode, Sons of Trigon, was released on August 29, 2013 for subscribers, and September 3, 2013 for those players who did not have an active subscription. The episode focused on going against DC villain Trigon as he takes over an alternate Gotham City. Some of the key features of this episode include a new location in Gotham Wastelands with daily Tier 5 missions, three Tier 5 Duos in Tunnel of Lust, Ruined Cathedral, and Knighsdome Arena, one Tier 5 Alert, and DC hero Raven featured as a weekly Tier 5 Bounty. Continuing the new trio of new powers, this episode brought the combo-based "Celestial" Healer power.

name: Suika Combination
description:
Can you combine them up to Suika?
Inspired by Suika Game

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 9 - War of the Light Part I
description: On January 22, 2014, the ninth episode, War of the Light Part I, was released. The episode revolved around the continuing battle between the Lantern Corps in Metropolis. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 5 4-Player Operations in Mist Recovery and Strike Team, one Tier 5 8-Player Operation in Assault and Battery, a new location in Downtown Metropolis Battlezone with weekly Tier 5 missions, and gave players access to either Ranx's Command Center or Mogo's Command Center. And finishing the new powers trio, it brought "Rage" as a tank power based on the Red Lanterns.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 10 - Amazon Fury Part I
description: The tenth episode, Amazon Fury Part I, was released on April 30, 2014 for players with an active subscription, and May 6, 2014 for players who did not have an active subscription. The episode focused on the battle between DC hero Wonder Woman and her mother Queen Hippolyta. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 6 Challenges in Aegis of Truth and Circe's Trial, two Tier 6 Duos in Port of Paradise and Supply Lines, one Tier 6 Alert in Themyscira Divided, and a new location in Gotham Under Siege with daily Tier 6 missions.

name: Watch Your Nightmares
description: Watch Your Nightmares is a point-and-click survival horror video fangame creat of Sweetsylveon. The game is based on FNaF 4 with a concept of camera system, and is released on July 31st, 2018.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 11 - Halls of Power Part I
description: On August 6, 2014, the eleventh episode, Halls of Power Part I, was released. The episode revolved around the New Gods of the Fourth World as they sought new ways to take control and engage in strategic battles on a cosmic level. Some of the key features of this episode include one Tier 6 4-Player Operation in Intergang Crime Wave, one Tier 6 Alert in Security Breach, one Tier 6 8-Player Operation in Artifacts from the Past, and two Tier 6 Raids in Relics of Urgrund and Lockdown.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 12 - War of the Light Part II
description: The twelfth episode, War of the Light Part II, was released on November 11, 2014 for players who had an active subscription, and November 18, 2014 for players who did not have an active subscription. The episode revolved around continuing the story first started in War of the Light Part I and the battle between the Lantern Corps. Some of the key features of this episode include one Tier 6 Challenge in Spark of Parallax, one Tier 6 Duo in Spark of Ion, one Tier 6 Alert in Zamaron Conversion Chamber, two Tier 6 4-Player Operations in Avarice Impurity and Rage Impurity, one Tier 6 8-Player Operation in Love and War, and featured a return to the Downtown Metropolis Battlezone location.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 13 - Amazon Fury Part II
description: On February 3, 2015 for members and February 12th, 2015 for non-members, the thirteenth episode Amazon Fury Part II, was released for players with an active subscription and players without respectively. The episode revolved around continuing the story first started in Amazon Fury Part I as players would continue the fight against the Amazon queen Hippolyta. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 6 Operations in Return to the Nexus and Act of Defiance, three Tier 6 Raids in Labyrinth of Lost Souls, Halls of Hades, and Throne of the Dead, in addition to a return to Gotham Under Siege location with daily Tier 6 missions.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 14 - Halls of Power Part II
description: The fourteenth episode, Halls of Power Part II, was released on May 12, 2015 for players with an active subscription, and May 19, 2015 for players without an active subscription. The episode revolved around continuing the story first started in the Halls of Power Part I episode, as players would continue their battle against the New Gods. Some of the key features of this episode include two Tier 7 Duos in Resource Recovery and League Hall: Malfunction, one Tier 7 4-Player Operation in Fatal Exams, one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in New Genesis Now, one Tier 7 Raid in Happiness Home, and a new location in New Genesis which gave players access to daily Tier 7 missions.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 15 - Bombshells Paradox & Corrupted Zamaron
description: On August 5, 2015 for members and August 12th, 2015 for non-members, the fifteenth episode Bombshells Paradox & Corrupted Zamaron, was released for players with an active subscription and without respectively. The episode revolved around players traveling to an alternate WW2-inspired universe where the DC Bombshells were faced with an infinite timeline war. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation called The Bombshell Paradox, and one Tier 7 Duo in Corrupted Zamaron.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 16 - Desecrated Cathedral and Oa Under Siege
description: The sixteenth episode, Desecrated Cathedral and Oa Under Siege, was released on September 2, 2015 for members, and September 9th, 2015 for non-members. The episode revolved around players defending OA as it faced a new threat from the Black Lantern Corps, and a new storyline with DC hero Raven. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 Alert in Desecrated Cathedral and one Tier 7 Challenge in Oa Under Siege.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 17 - Unholy Matrimony & The Flash Museum Burglary
description: On October 7, 2015 for members and October 14th, 2015 for non-members, the seventeenth episode, Unholy Matrimony and The Flash Museum Burglary, was released. The episode revolved around players continuing the storyline told in Episode 16 Desecrated Catherdral and a continuation of the League of Assassins storyline that started in Episode 15 The Bombshells Paradox. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Unholy Matrimony and one Tier 7 Duo in Flash Museum Burglary.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 18 - The Demon's Pit and Blackest Day
description: The eighteenth episode, The Demon's Pit and Blackest Day, was released on November 4, 2015 for members, and November 11th, 2015 for non-members. The episode revolved around players finishing the War of the Light saga and combating the League of Assassins' interest in Central City. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Blackest Day and one Tier 7 Duo in The Demon's Pit.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 19 - The Demon's Plan and Deep Desires
description: On December 2, 2015 for members and December 9th, 2015 and non-members, the nineteenth episode, The Demon's Plan and Deep Desires, was released. The episode revolved around concluding the League of Assassins storyline and served as an epilogue to the Episode 17 Unholy Matrimony storyline. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 Alert in The Demon's Plan and one Tier 7 Duo in Deep Desires.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 20 - Blackest Night & Wastelands Wonderland
description: The twentieth episode, Blackest Night and Wastelands Wonderland, was released on January 6, 2016 for members with a subscription, and January 13, 2016 for players without an active subscription. The episode revolved around players fighting The Blackest Night and dealing with the fallout from the War of the Light saga. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Blackest Night and one Tier 7 Duo in Wastelands Wonderland.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 21 - Prison Break and The First Piece
description: On February 4, 2016, and February 10, 2016, the twenty-first episode, Prison Break and The First Piece, was released. The episode revolved around working with a new stranger that asks the player to go on a couple of adventures. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 2-Player Operation in The First Piece and one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Prison Break.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 22 - Science Spire and The Phantom Zone
description: The twenty-second episode, Science Spire and The Phantom Zone, was released on March 2, 2016 for members and March 9th, 2016 for non-members. The episode revolved around dealing with Phantom Zone malfunctions and sightings of a mysterious figure near the Science Spire. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 Challenge in The Science Spire and one Tier 7 4-Player Operation in The Phantom Zone.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 23 - The Will of Darkseid and Brainiac's Bottle Ship
description: On April 6, 2016 for members and April 13th, 2016 for non-members, the twenty-third episode, The Will of Darkseid and Brainiac's Bottle Ship, was released. The episode revolved around dealing with prisoners who had escaped from the Phantom Zone and a potential new invasion from Darkseid's forces. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 2-PLayer Operation in The Will of Darkseid and one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Braniac's Bottle Ship.

name: Ame ni Utau Tanshikyoku: A Rainbow After the Rain
description:
Throughout the game you are presented with various flashbacks of a psychiatrist talking with a girl named Ame.

At the start of the story the protagonist lives with Chinatsu due to various happenings in his childhood that caused him to become an orphan, and as such mainly sees her as an older sister. The prologue basically starts out with Chinatsu telling the protagonist that 3 of her patients will come live with them for a few weeks as a part of their rehabilitation.

name: Froyo Taxi
description: Drive your taxi, pickup a passenger, drop them to their destination and earn money.

name: BassDuel
description: BassDuel 2.0 is a two player fishing game. Two anglers fish simultaneously from the same boat, just like the real thing. There are loads of customization options with lots of roads, baits, and colours to choose from. Heavy simulation mechanics make this a deep fishing game.

name: URBO
description: URBO is a relaxing and meditative city-building puzzle game. Begin with an empty grid of landscape, choose an architectural style and build. Aim to support the needs of your people and your own aesthetic tastes, and watch your city flourish.

name: ProtoViolence
description:
Can a scientist save a test subject from her life’s work?

All documents enclosed relate to ██. ██████ and █████████’s history within the Youth Training and Development Initiative (YTDI)’s child cybernetics and processing program. Unauthorized release of any information constitutes an unacceptable risk to stop’s reputation and will result in immediate termination and potential incarceration.

These documents were recovered from Stop backup servers from previously corrupted data. They pertain to the incident that occurred at YTDI Facility #001 on Oct. 1st, 207█, and record the events from ██. ██████'s first arrival at the facility to the date of the incident.

name: Space Hunter
description:
Space Hunter is a Japan-exclusive video game that was released in 1986 for the Family Computer. The game was published by Kemco; which was then known as Kotobuki System.

The plot apparently revolves around a robotic revolt led by a robot named De Gaulle. It is the year 2199 AD. By the explosions of global nuclear war, society has broken up into nine small expulsions, one of them disappeared and Venus collided with another celestial object. Humanity only slightly survived. Its thread of life barely connected to a body; which was rebuilt into a cyborg. The heroine is named Al Tiana and is also apparently a robot who does not support the rebellion. She is out to prove her loyalty to the humans.

name: Flesharmonic
description: It's a 20-maps megawad of raw and grilled meat to satisfy your insatiable appetite for wads!

name: Banana Sbang
description: Banana Sbang is a LCD game from VTech's Time & Fun Series created in 1981.

name: Bloody Slipgates
description: E1M1rmx with a twist: a certain amount of red keys scattered throughout the map have to be collected in order to proceed, making the gameplay largely non-linear.

name: Overgrown
description: 11 SP maps with an "overgrown" theme. Comes with a few custom skyboxes.

name: Memento Mori
description: A well made, pretty huge and nicely balanced medieval level. Somewhat confusing from time to time though.

name: Numb Nimbus
description: Large brick/metal void map.

name: Biotoxin
description: czg's entry for the second 100brush contest: a small industrial map with Quake2 textures.

name: Februus Depth
description: Large underground catacomb level.

name: The Slipgate Duplex
description: Professionally constructed remake of E1M1 with some additional areas.

name: Witch House Mixtape
description: Small to medium-sized wiztech level, industrial structures and crumbling brick buildings blending together.

name: Slipgate to a Lost Dimension
description: A small single classic-style map inspired by id base maps but with some eldritch monsters.

name: Slip Tripping
description: Retro style speedmap about dimension traversal for vanilla Quake.

name: Quad Run
description: An assorted pack of 15 levels made in 48 hours for a community speedmapping jam, all centered around the Quad Damage powerup.

name: Prototype Jam 3
description: 28 levels + custom start map, offering a variety of map sizes and gameplay themes. All maps were made in 1-2 weeks, using the Prototype textures by Khreathor. Built on Copper v1.19

name: Ceremonial Speedmaps
description: 13 SP maps inspired by Ceremonial Circles.

name: Coffee Quake 2: Double Shot
description: 132 short speed-maps + custom start map and end map, each made in two hours by 36 mappers for vanilla Quake. There were four episodic themes: Egypt, Runic, Koohoo, and Elder, and each episode is accessible from the start map hub.

name: Quake Brutalist Jam
description: 35 "concrete murderzones" inspired by modernist architecture, all made over 2.5 weeks by a variety of first-time mappers and veterans. Most maps make heavy use of Makkon textures. Built on Copper 1.19

name: Sewer Jam 2
description: 17 stinky sewer-themed maps (+ custom start map) running on a pre-release version of Alkaline 1.2 (already included), "created by a bunch of cool people" over a 4-week period.

name: 37th Relic Retrieval
description: Huge nonlinear IKbase level with over 900 enemies.

name: Armageddon 2
description: Small Metal level.

name: A Past and Future Secret
description: Medium-sized medieval stronghold surrounded by rocks and lava. A classic-style level in the spirit of Beyond Belief.

name: Awoken Madness
description: Huge metal/runic fortress built into the mountains, with a high monster count.

name: Nightshift
description: Large base map with some nightly outside areas.

name: The Putrid Pumps
description: Large metal/runic industrial slime temple.

name: Grokit
description:
Grokit is a hand tracking multiplayer mixed reality game aimed at rapid fire interactions. Inspired by WarioWare and Mario Party, players are dropped into bizarre situations where they must evaluate their environment and act in a short amount of time.

This game can be played in your own room with mixed reality passthrough on all Meta Quest headsets or in traditional virtual reality in a variety of handcrafted environments.

name: 28 Pixels Later
description:
In this short parody survival horror game, you'll solve puzzles, smoke plants to restore health, and, of course, blow zombies to pieces with a good old shotgun.

You will have to do all this in second person (from the eyes of the zombies you are killing)

name: Ciudad Anómala de Buenos Aires
description: Ciudad Anómala de Buenos Aires is an interactive narrative of strange but true stories that took place in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires. It has several mini games, humor, and constant interaction with mysterious and ghostly characters. Moreover, it is riddled with references to Argentine culture (from Borges to Cha Cha Cha) and the video games that shaped us.

name: High Energy Heroes
description: High Energy Heroes(高能英雄) is an exciting new 3D first-person(TBR)/ Third person hero-based Mobile. shooter game developed by Tencent Photon Studio. Similar to its direct adaptation Apex Legends, the game is set in a futuristic sci-fi world and offers players a wide range of hero characters, each with their unique abilities and personality traits. Players can choose their favorite hero characters and compete with other players in various gameplay modes.

name: Cozy Keep: Farm, Craft, Manage
description: Experience the daily life of a shopkeeper! Clean and decorate the place, pay taxes, gather resources and craft products that can be sold for maximum profits! Explore the world, hunt, and cultivate the land! Own the best shop in the region and save your father from the wrath of the King!

name: Livid Meadow
description: Livid Meadow is a short, story driven action platformer.

name: Luce's Journey: A Victorian Trading Tale
description:
Embark on a journey through the Victorian era as Luce, a young child determined to survive the harsh winter months.
In this survival experience, you'll need to manage your resources carefully, keeping track of hunger, cold, money, and, of course, your most valuable resource – matches.
You'll need to make strategic decisions about when to trade your matches. Buying them at a low price and selling them at a higher price is key to your success. But be warned – the market can be unpredictable, and you'll need to keep an eye on the daily match price.
Experience the thrill of the trade as you work to survive and thrive in this harsh and cruel society.

name: Dragon Quest IV: Michibikareshi Mono-tachi
description:
Embark on a journey to explore the land, seas and skies of the Dragon Quest universe in this grand entry from the Zenithia Trilogy. Soon to follow are Dragon Quest V: Hand of the Heavenly Bride and Dragon Quest VI: Realms of Reverie.

Indulge in the colorful Dragon Quest world created by Yuji Horii, combined with the charming characters and monsters designed by Akira Toriyama and memorable soundtrack from famed composer Koichi Sugiyama to create an unforgettable gaming experience.

Experience the world of Dragon Quest through the perspectives of multiple characters with a unique, chapter-driven storyline while you journey through a beautifully rendered 3D world, with dynamic dual screen presentation and newly animated monsters.

The original Japanese version has all of the original content not present in the localizations.

name: The Widow's Shadow
description:
Following her late husband’s funeral, a widow laments her loss. The townsfolk's whispers surround her every time she leaves the house, rumours she cannot avoid no matter how she tries.

Yet one night, everything she wishes to ignore will be laid bare as she steps into a twisted reality — one borne from her own heart.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs
description: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs is an online-only Pac-Man eating competition! Eat your way through multiple interconnected mazes using Power Pellets and a variety of Power Items to chomp the Ghosts and opponent PAC-MAN players! Be the last Pac standing at the end of each match in this 64-player Battle Royale to be the Chomp Champ!

name: Pokémon Unbreakable Ties
description: In the vibrant Akebia region, your childhood dream of becoming a Pokémon Master is reignited. But this isn't your typical journey. Uncover the secrets of the Royal Family's grip on the region, unravel Professor Alama's mysterious past, and protect the legendary Eon Pokémon from their grasp. With stunning visuals, engaging characters, and a gripping story, Pokémon Unbreakable Ties offers a fresh take on the classic Pokémon experience. Explore the region, challenge Gym Leaders, and forge unbreakable bonds with your team as you unravel a conspiracy that threatens to shatter the peace.

name: Crack in the Sky
description: Medium-sized floating castle ruins map ("15-20 minutes") with an interconnected layout inspired by level design tropes in From Software's games. Requires Copper v1.20+

name: Retro Jam 1
description: Impromptu map jam following a "retro" medieval/castle theme: five small maps by ericw, mfx, Scampie, Skacky and sock. It comes with optional medieval-style item models, and the map sources are included.

name: Arlyeh Center for Heart Diseases
description: A rebalanced version of mfx's map from Retro Jam 1: a medieval building nestled in a rocky cavern and fronted by a lake of slime. Features traps and tough comba

name: Dysnystaxis (...A Chance Meeting With Somnus)
description: A fixed version of Skacky's map from Retro Jam 1 (fixes an issue that made it impossible to load saved games): A small map set in a medieval courtyard and the surrounding buildings. Features somewhat non-linear gameplay.

name: Fallen from Grace
description:
Small medieval map, set in a courtyard and surrounding buildings.
An expanded version of Sock's map from Retro Jam 1, featuring bug fixes, a skill selection section, additional areas and gameplay, and more secrets than the original version of the map.

name: Moving parts
description: Seven smallish maps with moving objects. They are based on the Copper mod (included) and come with custom skyboxes and two music tracks.

name: Towers
description: Nine speedmaps made in less than three days, all themed around towers and verticality. Built on Speed Mapping Progs v2021.11 (already included). Organized by zigi.

name: Disposal Of Otherworldly Monsters
description: A large Doom themed map, using the SMEJ2 progs (already included). Contains music from Doom 2 OST.

name: Squire of Time
description: Episode with eight mostly small oldschool levels including a start map, each in various classic Quake themes. It comes with custom music tracks by Alientale.

name: The Dark Triad
description: Short episode with custom start map + 3 small / medium sized levels of various themes, with custom weapons and monsters. Some textures from Doom, some custom music sampled from Nine Inch Nails.

name: Final Fantasy
description: The first Final Fantasy game ported for the Game Boy Advance in the Final Fantasy: Dawn of Souls compilation released in 2004. It has new content, different mechanics and a bestiary added to the game.

name: GoblinAmerica
description:
GoblinAmerica is a fast-moded gun-style game set in a low-level gunkjuiced America.

As a solar goblin, you will possess myriad past, present, and future presidents at the worst moments in their lives, then set things right with a collection of startling guns, hats, beliefs, shoes, and creams. Will you safeguard the divinely-ordered existence of the Yellow Sun? Or will you allow the Verminstar’s disordered swamp to chew this world back into formlessness?

name: Fhtagn Nagh
description: Large tower temple map "built entirely on the 64-unit grid. A brushwork experiment taken to strange extremes." Requires Copper v1.20+ (NOT included). Custom music by Pantheist

name: Xmas Jam 2017
description: Func Xmas Jam 2017 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 11 small AD maps in varied styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It comes with a few custom skyboxes, sounds, and a music track

name: Der Wanderer über dem Säuremeer
description: Small and tight vertical runic level.

name: Chainmap Chaos
description: Four chainmaps by various authors, each one following a Honey, Zendar, Egyptian and Knave theme.

name: Luna in Silver Shards
description: Small Hexen2-textured 100 brush map. Comes with a custom skybox.

name: Quakeguy Goes to White Castle
description: 15 speedjam SP levels, five custom skyboxes, a music track, and some map sources.

name: Terracotta
description:
Terracotta / 12 SP maps / Danzadan, Ing-ing, ionous, ish, JCR, muk0r, Newhouse, PinchySkree, prengle, Shambler, vaf, Andrew Yoder
Includes various custom skyboxes and map sources, and some of the maps may require a source port with increased limits.

name: Contract Revoked: The Lost Chapters
description: Hub-based SP episode with 9 medium to large levels (including start and secret maps). Uses Knave textures and features new monsters/powerups
"Speedmapping" jam pack 198: 16 SP levels + a start map. Also includes two custom skyboxes and music tracks as well as the map sources.

name: Super Scope 15
description: A sequel for Super Scope 6 was being developed around 1993/1994, but was never announced. It became public when found in the 2020 Nintendo Gigaleak.

name: Oozing Blasphemy
description: Large challenging dark industrial runic map with 16 secrets and custom sounds, built for Arcane Dimensions 1.81

name: Only You Can Prevent Containment Breaches
description: Medium to large, semi-linear level with a dungeon ruin inside an underground base. Includes some custom audio and music.

name: This Onion
description: Large medieval castle in an underground cave with DKTe3 textures, a couple of new monsters and (optional) background music.

name: A Roaming Wildebeest In Spain
description: Based on Tronyn's scrapped Roman Wilderness of Pain maps, this level represents another sort of Metagyptian environment. It abounds with typical Quake monster fights and should give an experienced Quaker about 25 minutes of good quality fraggin'. A large open Egyptian temple framed by mountains

name: Once Upon Atrocity
description: Large, spacious Q3Gothic-style fortress in a blood canyon, featuring some modified monsters and an evil dragon boss.

name: For My Babies 8
description: Based on Tronyn's Runezig map, this level represent a sort of Metagyptian environment. Medium to large Egyptian temple.

name: Ambush Keen Pilgrims
description: Fairly small egypt style map with excellent brushwork and great gameplay! Created from Pingu's deathmatch map A2: Return to Atlantis.

name: Adamantine Cruelty
description: A large brick/metal sewer-type map with an optional secret area. Comes with an extra skill selection map.

name: Head Reattachment Trauma
description: Small short linear single player sci-fi base map with Makkon textures.

name: The Stars We Lost To Grief
description: A small wizard / runic themed map built within a 1024x1024x1024 volume.

name: Antediluvian
description: Medium sized Metal level inspired by "The Wind Tunnels" (e3m5), already started in 2001 but only finished four years later. A map with a strong old-school flair.

name: Blastris: Blastris A
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Blastris: Blastris B
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Blastris: Mole Patrol
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: LazerBlazer: Type A - Intercept
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: LazerBlazer: Type B - Engage
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: LazerBlazer: Type C - Confront
description: One of the games found in Super Scope 6.

name: Spring Breeze
description: Spring Breeze is the first main game in Kirby Super Star and Kirby Super Star Ultra. It is essentially a simplified remake of Kirby's Dream Land, with some differences to compensate for this. It is the first main game to be playable, and is designed to introduce new players to the game.

name: GTRevival
description: Sin descripción

name: Dyna Blade
description: Dyna Blade is the second main game featured in Kirby Super Star and its remake, Kirby Super Star Ultra. In this game, Dyna Blade, a large bird with metal wings, has stolen crops from local farmers. Kirby must go through four levels and two hidden areas, before finally fighting Dyna Blade herself.

name: Gourmet Race
description: Gourmet Race is the third main game in Kirby Super Star and Kirby Super Star Ultra. This game pits Kirby against King Dedede in a friendly competition to see who can reach the finish line on a straightforward race course while grabbing and eating as much food as possible along the way.

name: The Great Cave Offensive
description: The Great Cave Offensive is the fourth main game available in Kirby Super Star and its remake, Kirby Super Star Ultra. It features a large labyrinthine cavern system divided into four stages, with the goal being to escape the cave, while collecting Treasure along the way.

name: Revenge of Meta Knight
description: Revenge of Meta Knight is the fifth main game in Kirby Super Star and its remake. This game takes a much more serious tone than the other games in the collection, and tasks Kirby with stopping Meta Knight and the Meta-Knights from taking over Dream Land using their giant ominous flying warship, the Halberd.

name: Milky Way Wishes
description: Milky Way Wishes is the sixth main game in Kirby Super Star and its remake, and the final one in the former. This game is unlocked by completing The Great Cave Offensive and Revenge of Meta Knight (which requires clearing Dyna Blade) in Kirby Super Star.

name: The Arena
description: The Arena is a Sub-Game debuting in Kirby Super Star, where the requirement is to the defeat the Main Game bosses and mid-bosses encountered in the title it appears in, with a single life, with limited health benefits. It is similar to Boss Endurance modes, but is generally given more importance, and is always required for 100% completion of the game.

name: Special Ops
description: Introducing the "Special Ops Trilogy" - an epic collection of three high-octane special forces games that will test your mettle and stealth skills to the limit.

name: Ape Reunion
description: An open world MMO RPG pixel art game using NFTs as characters.

name: Yatzi
description: Skillful combination is half the battle!

name: High Cars
description: Dangerous driving high in the sky!

name: Domino Draw
description: Draw the domino path!

name: Jigsaw Ice Princess
description: Solve 45 beautiful princess jigsaws in a magical ice world

name: Loot Box Quest: Mystic Maidens
description:
The mystic anime maidens are waiting for you.
Don't let them wait for too long.

name: Submersible Simulator: Discover the Titanic into Ocean
description: Riddles of the deep sea await you. Become the number one underwater explorer!

name: Treasure Of The Giantess
description: Third-person adventure, dark atmospheric puzzle game

name: Zero Conflict TD
description: Fight alien invasion through 30 regions and save the planet. Each level will test you in new and challenging ways. Test your skill and stop the invasion once and for all.

name: Torque Drift 2
description: From the colourful drift scene of Tokyo streets to professional competitions sponsored by global brands, Torque Drift 2 invokes all aspects of drift culture and offers an experience as diverse and dynamic as the motorsport itself.

name: SpectralClimb
description: 3D Platformer with some basic combat!

name: RoboCop: Rogue City - Alex Murphy Edition
description: Pre-purchase now to get the blue version of the hero's armour from RoboCop 2 and a "Pitch Black" version of your Auto-9 weapon.

name: Overpass 2: Career Starter Pack
description: The Career Starter Pack gives you access to more effective teammates. Gain the services of an experienced mechanic, researcher, meteorologist and geomorphologist to help you make faster progress.

name: Overpass 2: Polaris Vehicles Pack
description: Take the wheel of two iconic Polaris vehicles in two categories: the RZR XP 1000 High Lifter (UTV) and the Scrambler 850 (ATV).

name: Overpass 2: Ford Play Rock Bouncer
description: The Ford Play Rock Bouncer is an 800 hp monster that can climb the steepest slopes. Its high-performance suspension and oversized tyres make it your best friend when it comes to taking on the most difficult challenges.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 01
description: Put your skills to the test with the RIDE 5 - Free Pack 01 to get two lightning-fast naked bikes that combine power and excellent handling!

name: Ride 5: Far East Pack
description: Add 2 Japanese race winners to your garage with RIDE 5 - Far East Pack.

name: Chain Crisis
description: Chain Crisis: An immersive cyberpunk MMORPG set in a futuristic world. Experience thrilling battles, powerful abilities, and an engaging storyline. Uncover the secrets of a dystopian society and forge your destiny. Join the revolution on Solana! #MMORPG #Cyberpunk

name: BeetleQuest 2023
description: BeetleQuest is an adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on a great adventure together. Visit sunny forests, mysterious swamps, dark caves, and even a land underwater! All beautifully hand-drawn and animated, and filled with point and click goodness!

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Deluxe Pack
description: The Deluxe Pack includes a Prince of Persia-inspired outfit, eagle and mount skins, weapons, and more! Dress yourself as a prince and play with the Sands of Time to turn the world of Baghdad into a wondrous tale in which the flow of time can be manipulated.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Fire Demon Pack
description: Summon devilish monsters from the underworld by using your burning weapons to rip the souls from your opponents' chests. This pack contains an outfit, a sword, a dagger, a mount skin, an eagle skin, and an outfit dye.

name: Annihilith Of Abhorration
description: Small Zerstörer-themed level.

name: Conference of the Shamblers
description: Huge Knave-style fortress with many enemies and secrets. The map source is included.

name: Warmth Of A Dying Sun
description: Medium-sized Egyptian-style level. Comes with a custom desert skybox.

name: Cloisterfuck
description: Large cloister/castle map combining Wizard/Medieval/Metal textures. Somewhat inspired by E2M5. It comes with a custom skybox.

name: Six textures
description: Comes with two custom skyboxes and a music track. Some map sources are included.

name: Organic Dissociation
description: Medium-sized toxic sewer/industrial base map.

name: A Quick One Before Azathoth Devours Fodrian
description: Small to medium-sized Knave-themed level. The map source and a texture wad are included.

name: The Anomaly
description: Medium-sized base map with a unique twist: 'anomalies' have warped several areas which now play tricks on the player's mind and perception.

name: The Anomaly 2: Water
description: Large brick/metal complex where reality is twisted and many optical illusions occur. Nonlinear, explorational gameplay with puzzles and a great number of secret areas. The sequel to digs05.

name: The Parallel Worlds
description: A huge and highly detailed base map with a unique twist - it is actually three levels in one, to be played in succession. Each exit leads to a different version of the same map with modified layouts/routes and monster placement.

name: Digs03
description: Large interconnected metal-style windtunnel map.

name: Subterranean Library
description: Large ruined subterranean library with tight corridors, bloodfalls and eerie atmosphere. The map source is included.

name: Toybox
description: Three small, experimental levels with cartoony textures and gameplay focusing on exploration and movement. The map sources are included.

name: Round The U-Bend
description: Small base/industrial-style map. A reinterpretation of the original DM5 - part of than's ongoing DMxRMX series. The map source is included.

name: Geophobia
description: Professional remake of Quake's semi-stock map DM7: A small to medium-sized medieval fortress inside a canyon. The map source (in standard and WC format) is included.

name: Pretend Dead Friend
description: Small wizard-style deathmatch arena with single player settings. The map source is included (in standard and WC format).

name: The Occupied Base
description: Professional remake of Quake's original deathmatch map DM3. Highly detailed and many expanded areas for single player, yet still maintaining the original layout in deathmatch mode. Map source is included.

name: Welcome to IKSPQ
description: Start map of the IKSPQ series.

name: Before Nightfall
description: First map of the IKSPQ series: a small Wizard castle in the mountains.

name: Temple of the Thousand-Faced Moon
description: Second map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple map. Nice.

name: Halls of the Shambler God
description: Third map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple map. Nice.

name: Homecoming
description: Fourth map of the IKSPQ series: a medium sized blue temple with an outside bit.

name: The Secret Installation
description: Fifth map of the IKSPQ series: a medium-sized IKbase map.

name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: But They Do Carry Shotguns
description: A large submerged base with great attention to detail and exploratory gameplay. The map source is included.

name: Oxyblack Fortress
description: Huge lava fortress using custom textures by Makkon. It comes with a few new sounds, a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: Power Structure
description: Large sci-fi base map with Makkon textures, made for Alkaline v1.1+ (Not included). Custom music is "Flow" by Anna Centauri.

name: Splitz
description:
Splitz is a remake of the 1986 computer game Split Personalities. The gameplay is essentially the same as that game and resembles a sliding puzzle game but has a different set of pictures. Unlike traditional sliding puzzles all the pieces are not on the board from the start but are launched by the player from the top left corner of the board. The pieces can then be pushed horizontally or vertically with the goal being to recreate a picture which can be shown at any time by pressing a button. The game is timed and if a puzzle is not completed fast enough, one of three lives will be lost.

All features from the original game are retained. This include doors that open and close and that can be used to push pieces out of play. They will then be put pack into the queue and be ready to be launched again. There are also various bonus items that can be pushed into each other for bonus points or time increases. Some items have negative effects such as bombs that explode after five seconds (and take a life away). Bombs have to be pushed out through a door or combined with a water tap to be destroyed. At some places there are cracks in the walls. Pushing a piece into a crack causes it to bounce back to its original position.

name: The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant race
description: The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race (ザ・プロ野球 ペナントレース) is a Sega Master System baseball game developed by Whiteboard and published by Sega. Exclusively released in Japan in 1987, the game is an evolution of the developer's earlier title Great Baseball, and is now played from a bird's-eye perspective.

name: Sim Taxi 2
description: Another day in the big city from a taxi driver's point of view. Look out for passengers and deliver them to their destinations as fast as you can, and without damaging your taxicab too much.

name: Roll me Home
description: Roll the character with the rudder and jump. As usual, it's a space bar It has simple manipulation, but it's not going to be an easy challenge Understand the physics of things and explore the silhouette.

name: Frost & Flame: King of Avalon

name: Dragon of Saiyu
description: Dragon of Saiyu retells the classic tale of Journey To The West in Retro 2D platformer style . Play as the young aspiring monk, Sanzang, and defeat strong foes in his quest of attaining the legendary scrolls from the Buddha of far west.

name: Platform 10
description:
Every train carriage in Sydney is given a 4 digit long carriage number.
Back in the day, me and some mates of mine had a game where you'd have to take those numbers and make 10 out of em; using whatever math function you could think of. 5290? (9x0)+(5x2) = 10, Easy.

name: You're Gonna Miss the Bus!
description:
Henry is running late for school ... again.

YGMTB is an endless runner where you play as a kid trying to make it to the bus on time. Jump, double jump, and slide your way past delivery bots, tree branches, couches, cats, drones, bollards, garden gnomes (non-feral) and myriad other obstacles.

name: BAM
description:
Step into the thrilling world of BAM, the ultimate multiplayer battle game designed for mixed reality (MR). Whether you’re a seasoned gamer or new to the virtual realm, BAM offers a unique and captivating experience that transcends boundaries.

In BAM, you wield unprecedented control over your battlefield. Set up the tabletop arena anywhere you want, and adjust its scale and rotation. Then take charge of your miniature robot puppeteer-style.

Engage in an adrenaline-pumping fast-paced boxing match. Fire up your jetpack to take the battle up in the air. Collect power-ups to gain special powers, including an innovative “point-to-action” mechanic, offering a fresh perspective on third-person shooting in MR.

BAMs colorful, vibrant arenas pop in every room and are the stage for different game modes. Seize the crown, lose the bomb, or punch your opponents out of the field. Easy-to-master controls and stunning visuals redefine MR gaming, making BAM a must-play experience for all ages.

Play against AI-bots, or challenge other players all around the world. BAM guarantees instant fun and excitement. Competing against friends in the same room makes BAM the perfect party game.

Dive into the future of MR gaming. Enter the electrifying world of BAM.

name: Sim Taxi
description:
The main objective of the game is to look for passengers and deliver them to their destinations as quickly as possible without damaging your car. A phone operator will help you locate customers. There's a compass on the top left to guide you.
There is a fuel and damage indicator on the bottom left and right of your screen. Check up on them periodically to avoid losing the game. Fill up on fuel, repair the taxi, upgrade your taxi and enjoy the ride.

name: Treasure Seas Incorporated

Use your Submarine to Plunder all the Treasures of the Caribbean! Careful, though, Sharks eat Submarines.

Discover all three Trade Routes! Upgrade your Submarine to reach Deeper Depths! Follow Dolphin's advice and avoid the sharks.

As you returned to the living world you felt the presence of the hero who had slain you has given chase. You have one month to prepare for his arrival so you can tell him how you really feel about him!

The game is a training simulator for shooting. Teaches players the correct aim.

The game has game modes in which there is a battle between players, success points, and music drops. All this in correction

name: Homeward
description:
It is time to start the journey back home. Pack your bag carefully and set out to face whatever adventures await along the way.

Homeward is a short text-based adventure game, where you have to manage a small inventory. What will you throw away and what will you keep for later?

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 54. The theme was 'limited space'.

Surprise! themes including delectable sweets, Route 707, outer space and beyond. With each race you will earn Glitter Points to open L.O.L. Surprise! Balls and unlock different surprises like stickers and accessories to use in future races.

name: Resident Evil: Containment
description:
Resident Evil - Containment, is a new stand alone total conversion mod for the original 1996 release of Resident Evil. It follows the story of Ghost, a member of the Umbrella Security Service, who were sent into the Arklay Research Facility to investigate a distress call. This mod takes place shortly before the events of Resident Evil 0 and Resident Evil.

The mod features a whole new story that loosely fits within the original Resident Evil time-line as well as many brand new locations, some of these new locations are based off the scrapped prototype concept art for Resident Evil and others are all brand new original creations. It also contains new cutscenes, new puzzles, new events, new music, new sounds, new FMV movies and also new gameplay features never before seen in Resident Evil!

Experience the world of survival horror one more time in this brand new, complete, stand-alone, total conversion mod for Resident Evil!

name: Half-Life 2: MMod - Half-Life 2: Episode One
description:
This mod allows Half-Life 2: Episode One to be run under MMod.

The goal of Half-Life 2: MMod is to enhance and expand gunplay, combat mechanics and the immersion factor by giving the Player more options and combat opportunities as well as refine how the Player handles his arsenal. Half-Life 2: MMod also offers minor AI enhancements, extended abilities for combine soldiers ( dynamic jumping, firing smg1 underbarrel grenades, shotgunner double blast, etc. ), multiple bug fixes, enhanced visuals, VFX re-design, sound redesign and much much more, while keeping nearly every new feature in the mod totally optional.
